content: Making me repeat myself... it's useless. It hate it because it's useless, useless, useless...
You're someone who's prepared himself for conflict. If you are prepared to kill someone, then that must mean that in turn, you're prepared for the danger and possibility of being killed yourself...
I had just announced that I wouldn't allow civilians to get involved... I apologize, that was a lie.

No. You won't try to kill me anymore. Because you'll become my ally. I'm planning on defeating your Boss and taking over this city. In order to get rid of gangsters who sell drugs to children... you have to become a gang member yourself.
Yes...! To take control of this city, I have to enter into the organization that is currently in control and work my way up...! I'm going to become a Gang-star!
I, Giorno Giovanna, have a dream!
I, Giorno Giovanna, have a dream that I know is just.

So. You asserted that when someone is insulted, murder is permitted, correct? I see, that is in fact a very important distinction. Because you insulted that innocent old man's life. And that's why I turned one of your pistols into a banana. It's your last meal, take your time... enjoy it.
Did I [drink Abbacchio's piss]...? Well, you all keep your abilities a secret, don't you?
They will catch us in no time if we steal a single car. But, if we steal a hundred cars, then thy might have a harder time figuring out which one we're on.
This sensation! I don't exactly get it, but... My Gold Experience... I feel the birth of something new! I sense the birth of something newer and greater than before!!
This is what resolve is! It is to carve out your destined path through the darkened wastes!

Mista... your resolve shines with a radiance that eclipses even the sun rising at our backs and sheds light upon our path... and it illuminates the righteous fated path that we shall walk together hereafter, as well! Mudamudamudamudamudamudamudamuda!!!!

The unconscious... Stand abilities are, in a sense, the unconscious talents of their Users. If any sense of guilt exists in your heart, then that will unconsciously put a brake on your ability. But this man delights in cruelty. It is his reason for living... that's why he has this ability. If he can do this, that means he has no brakes! There is no limit to his evil.
Know your place. A deal like this is too good to be true for a man like you. Mudamudamudamudamudamudamudamudamudamuda!!! WRYYYYYY!!! MUDAMUDAMUDAMUDAMUDAMUDAMUDAMUDAMUDAAAAAA!!!
We're leaving you here... I won't let anyone... hurt you anymore, I promise... but, I swear that I will bring you home.
The ending is something which has no ending. That is Gold Experience Requiem.
This taste... is the taste of a liar! Giorno Giovanna!
My name is Bruno Bucciarati. Answer me. This interrogation has already become a torture session!
Get away? You don't have to worry about me getting away. The only thing you should worry about... is what will happen once you're pulled apart and left on the ground by my zippers.
For that honorable determination that you showed when you injured your own arm and for your dream which is worth its weight in gold... I'll take my chances on you, Giorno Giovanna.

You should know better than anyone else that none of us got where we are by pissing ourselves every time someone gave us an empty threat. If you stop, I'll let this slide. But the moment you stab Abbacchio, I take your life.
To complete my mission and protect my men. Having to do both at once is what makes being a capo so tough. Are you ready for this? I know I am.
There's only the way to beat him. I'll just have to show him... just which one of us has the greater resolve! I'll show him! It's do or die!
To lie here, absolutely motionless... that... is my resolve!
The words \"I'll kill you\" shouldn't be left unsaid until the deed is already done. That's how it works in the gangsters' world we live in.
You can't pull a fast one on me, scumbag. ARIARIARIARIARIARIARIARIARIARIARIARI! Arrivederci!
You must pay! You have betrayed my heart once again! I was only planning to uncover your identity... but there has been a change of plans! I'm going to kill you instead! Right now!
My mission has ended, you say? You're dead wrong. It's not over just yet! I've given myself a mission to protect Trish!
I only did what I thought was right. I have no regrets. Even in this rotten world, I still want to walk down a path I can believe in!
Are you busy right now? Sorry but could you answer a quick question? The airport's too big and I don't really know where things are. I'd like to steal an airplane. Do you know where I might find one?
As long as you can ride a car out of the village, then we are good. As long as we can all head to Roma. ARIARIARIARIARIARIARIARIARIARIARIARI! Arrivederci!

It's enigmatic... I've accepted this as my fate. The heavens just happened to smile on me a little bit. It seems that when you healed my wounds in Venezia, the life energy you gave me alloved me to move for just a bit longer.

Giorno... you brought me back to life. When I met you in my hometown of Naples... when we betrayed the gang. My heart had been dying a slow death. And it came back to life, all thanks to you. This is what happiness is. I'm fine with this. Don't worry about it... give everyone my best... Don't worry about it. Things are just going back... to they way they should be... Just going back... to normal...
Giorno... the fact that we made it here... is a complete victory. This is good... everything will be fine... Fate is a sleeping slave... we have to set it free... that is victory...
There are ** 4 ** cakes! Are they telling me to go die or something?

It's bad luck to take something from four things! It's fine if you're choosing from five! It's also fine if you're choosing from three! But if you choose something from four things, something bad'll happen.

Which one do you want me to use? The glasses, or the fishing line? We're gonna make you answer some questions. If you don't, we're gonna be trouble! Lots of danger ahead, you understand. So, \"Mr\" Zucchero. You've got a partner, right? He's probably a Stand User too, huh? What's why I'm going to have to have to use these? You don't want to answer me? Not even about which one I should use? Well, if you're not going to choose... I'm gonna use both! Whoops!
My Stand's suited for assassinations. I'm good at that stuff.
Assassination's the surer bet as long as we're using my Sex Pistols.

Whether you answer me or not, I got one simple question to ask you, just one. And if you don't answer me in two seconds, I'm gonna put a bullet in each of your eyeballs. One, two. I won't wait any more than that! If you don't feel chatty, then I'll just figure out the answer myself! Understand? Okay, here we go. Where's your buddy hiding? Uno! Due! Now die! Ready to meet your maker?
I don't like your idea of victory! We'll send this guy to Hell, find the thing, and the both of us will make it safe and sound! That's what victory is, are we clear, Giorno!?

You asked me... if that was all the resolve I had left... right? Well it wasn't. No, it fucking wasn't... You're about to find out. But you'd better show some resolve of your own! You'll need it 'cause it's gonna be a long ride all the way down to Hell!
Brute force is our only option! It's time for my resolve to shine! Pistols! You guys better get your asses in gear, too!
Aahhh!! Giorno! Not so rough! No, not there! Nonono!! Oh! Be gentle! Gentle! Don't strip me! I can feel you! Ohh! No! No more!
Go, Pistols! Blast those bullets through his skull!
Who's a \"shit-brained idiot\", huh? Dont make fun of me! I'll fucking kill you! I'm gonna fucking kill you, Fugo!
Fill him with lead, Aerosmith!
Kill me, damn it... you think Narancia Ghirga is the kind of guy who'd sell his crew out to save his own hide?
Bucciaratiiii!!!! I'm coming! I'm coming with you! Let me on!
You can't stop us... We're gonna break outta Venezia, safe and sound! See ya. Vola vola vola vola vola vola vola!!! Volare via!
I just gotta keep my distance! That's all! But my Aerosmith doesn't need to get close to blow you to bits!

When I get home, I'm gonna go to school... It might be cool to let the guys make fun of me for being dumb... and I wanna eat some fresh, hot pizza! An authentic margherita from my hometown, baked over an oak fire, with porcini mushrooms on top!

Is this your idea of a joke, you little punk?! How many times do I have to teach you before you finally learn?! You said that 6 times 5 is 30 so why the hell would your answer be less than 30!? You shit-brained idiot!
I'd like to order this man some spaghetti, if you don't mind!
You'll be the one dying... once you've witnessed my Stand!
I'm sorry, but none of us will board that boat. You aren't facing the facts. Nobody can survive in this world on ideals alone. We can't live without the gang.
This is madness! What are they thinking!? All for a girl we met two days ago! A girl we've never even really talked to! She's nobody to us! We don't even know what kind of music Trish likes!
Why are people coming after me, all for a father I've never even met!? Answer me!
I want to know my origins, no matter what! I refuse to die before finding out!
WANNNABEEEE!!!!
Why!? Why am I Mista now!? There's hair growing on my fingers! My nails are short and they're shaped all wrong and there's gunk under them! I can't live like this!
H..hey you! Where do you think your fingers are going!? Keep your fingers out of my panties! Don't spread your legs any wider or I'll kill you!
I, too can overcome the fate I inherited from you. I will not cower or flee! If you try to stop me, I shall soar beyond you.
I have always been here. I have always been here by your side, ever since you were a little girl.
u have already made up your mind! You have already chosen to protect Giorno's left hand! Hesitation leads to weakness. Now... please, give me your orders.
Without speed... but! With as much force as a vise! It's time to slice this piece of shit up and kill it for good!
How ironic, they joined the gang because society cast them out. And now, here they are trying to save the world from evil.
There is a hidden meaning within this Arrow! I shall tell you of it! You must acquire a power that surpasses King Crimson! Come to Rome! This Arrow is the final and only method to defeat that man!
He who fully controls the Arrow will control the world!

This is \"Requiem\". Yes, what you see is indeed reality. Your ability indeed sees the actions that we will actually perform. However, you will never arrive at the reality that will occur. None who stand before me shall ever do so. No matter what abilities they may wield! This is Gold Experience Requiem!
Tulululululu! TULULULULULULU!!! Yes? This is Doppio.
I miss you... Boss... call me... like you always do... I'll be waiting... Call... me...
Leave this place, Bruno Bucciarati... if you come out from behind that pillar... you will die.

This is the end of the line. So, why shouldn't I tell you..? What you have witnessed and laid hands upon was your own future self! The \"you\" of a few seconds past saw your future self. That is the ability of my King Crimson! I eradicated time and forced it to skip!
I shall not allow anyone, no matter who they may be, to threaten my everlasting climax. I will eradicate every last one of them.

I can forecast the trails left by your movements... the trails of your future actions. Within King Crimson's ability, time is erased from the world and none can remember the footprints they left during this time! The clouds in the sky do not realize they have been scattered by the winds! An extinguished flame is not aware of the moment it has been snuffed! It is only the results! Only the results that remain in this world! All the actions you take in a world where time is erased are meaningless! And I alone can react to these actions! I can see exactly how you will act! That is the ability of my King Crimson!
Even if you try to erase it, the past will always come back to lock true peace away from you.
If anyone knows even the slightest fragment of my true nature!... They must not be allowed to live.
Do you understand, Doppio!? I must crush my fear! Now is the time... I must overcome it right now! That is what it means to live!
The past... even when you break it to pieces and emtomb it in stone, it crawls out like a worm.

I never predicted that anyone would be foolish enough to betray my gang, and I never imagined that anyone would discover my identity, ever. But, thanks to you, I have learned of this Arrow's true ability! This is a gift! A tribute that fate has given me for overcoming my past!
I am the Emperor. What I see is to remain upon the climax.
I, Diavolo, am the Emperor! This fact remains unchanged!
My ability stands upon the apex of reality!
Didn't I tell you? Don't underestimate me.
Within him, Giorno had definitely inherited the will of the Joestar bloodline!
Humans often... say something and do the opposite. That's the beauty of humans, though it can just as often be the ugly side of them...
I'll give you a chance... to see the two paths that you can follow... the first path for the chosen ones who will life... and the other! The path of death!

If the most important thing in this world is trust, then, conversely, the most detestable thing in the world is to insult that trust. Do you understand? Whe you insult someone's trust, not only do you tarnish their good name, you interrupt their lives and back them into an inescapable corner. We don't fight for money or profit nor do we risk our lives or start riots because some fool took our seat on the bus or our concert tickets. However! Once we feel that our trust has been insulted, we have a sanction to put lives on the line. I feel that even God would permit murder, in this situation!
I'm the one doin' the talking here! I'm the one in control!
You managed to hit me twice 'cause you had the element of surprise on your side. But if I go all-out with my Stand, Kraft Work, it ain't a challenge for me to swat your bullets down.
You done yet, Mista? 'cause if you are, this bullet here is all charged up!
Talk, Narancia! If it's impossible to tail you, I'll just have to make you sing!
I shrank myself! That's my ability, Little Feet! The other guys say it's worthless... hehehe well, whether it's worthless or worth-ful is all up to how you use it...
What a real shame... just going shopping... turned into a huge mess... am I right, Narancia? And from here on out... it'll only get worse... for all of you...
I stand secured and unmatched inside the mirror... that is my ability.
Now that you've seen me...it's already over for you!
Got him! He took the bait!
Ohh! It's Mista! Shoot my line all you want, my Beach Boy's line can pass through anything, aside from its prey, like it's water! You can't cut it!
I get it now, fratellone Prosciutto! I understand your resolve, not through your words but through your spirit! From the moment we think of the word /"kill/" ... the deed has already been done.
I just killed a man for the first time... but it feels kind of anticlimactic. And now, nobody in the world... can call me a mammone anymore...
I can feel everything! None of your tricks can help you now, Bucciarati... I can read you like an open book! And before fra dies, I'll finish you off!

Reentered the lower arm! 4cm to the elbow! 3 cm! Popping my hook outta your arm for a split second is not gonna save you, Bucciarati! There's nothing you can do but wait until Beach Boy's hook crawls up your arm and snags your heart!
Before fra's life leaves his body...! I'll make you pay before his very eyes!!

Hey, could you shut up already? Talking about \"killing this\" and \"killing that\".... what's the big idea, huh? We don't use those words in our world, those words are for dogs to use. We don't need to say "I'll kill you"... because by the moment those words come into our minds... our target's already dead and the deed is done!

I'm angry at your spiritual weakness, Pesci. I can't blame you for getting shaken up when they shot up your ice! You'd start aging too, after all! But! If it were anyone else on our team, they wouldn't dispel their Stand when it was so close to grabbing the enemy by the throat! Not even if they got their arms blasted off or their legs ripped apart!

I'm gonna say it straight. Our team! We're nothing like those fools trying to pick up girls on the street or partying at the club. Those pathetic losers just scream and shout, going \"I'll kill you! I'll kill you!\" just to soothe their wounded egos. When we truly think \"I'll kill you!\" from the bottom of our hearts...! By that time, the deed has already been done!
Glory... to you... Pesci... Kill him... Kill him, Pesci... I...am watching... over you...
Di molto!
Molto bene! That was a good slap! You snapped your wrist and put your hips into it. A slap this sharp proves you're in good health. You're in excellent condition! ** *lick* **
It takes some doing, but the children of Baby Face are invincible long-range Stands! There's nothing that can defeat them!
Mom says I smell. She's calling me gross and filthy. I have the best mom in the world!
... For the pain in my soul! I'll make you die in shame!
Simple is best! I'll kill you my own way!

I've gotta find them, come hell or high water... That phrase, \"hell or high water\"... I get the \"high water\" part. I totally get it, 'cause maybe a flood could happen or something... but what the fuck does the \"come hell\" part mean?! Who thinks hell can just move around!? What a stupid fucking phrase! It seriously pisses me off! You think Hell's gonna grow arms and legs and crawl out of the ground, huh?! Fuck no, you dumb shit! Hell stays right underground where it belongs!!

In English, they say it like \"Pairiss\"... but the rest of the world says \"Paree\" like the French do. So how come everyone calls Venezia by its English name, \"Venice\"?! The Merchant of Venice and Death in Venice... Why can't they call it Death in Venezia!? Are you happy with that!? I'm not happy at all! Is this your idea of a fucking joke!? It's Italian, you goddman bastards! Speak fucking Italian! Fuck, that pisses me off! You stupid motherfuckers!
You won't escape... whatever is at the station is coming home with me, Ghiaccio.

You're wasting your ammo. My ability White Album uses cryogenic temperature to freeze the moisture in the air into a suit of armor. I can use it to skate around, and it's strong enough to stop bullets!

Once you hit cryogenic temperatures, you enter a world of stillness. There is nothing that can move in the cryogenic world. I can freeze anything in the universe! That's what makes White Album so perfect! Even roaring train engines, even the raging seas will come to a grinding halt at my command! None can defy my whims!
White Album Gently Weeps! I've already set up a wall of frozen air!
Is that all the resolve you got!? This is it, Mista!!

The Boss's orders... those don't matter anymore. I'm not killing him to complete my mission. Tiziano, I'm killing him for you. I won't leave even a scrap of him behind. And I'll kill every last member of his team... I'll rip them to pieces and make them pay for what they've done! Clash! Tear out his throat!
All according to plan.
We are still victorious. Victory is still... ours...
Intriguing. I'm curious to know who you are. But, I don't have time to waste. If you're a Stand User, I'll need you to die.
A close-ranged, power type. That's the sort of ability you have... As long as I know your range is 2 to 3 meters, then this assassination... is complete.
Am I even closer than I thought... to what I must seek? I wish to know what you are. I wish to see your true form... I must discover that as I take your life!
Even if you know the truth behind my Stand, Metallica,... it is too late. Because at this point, I am already done with you!
No matter how heavily someone breathes after massive amounts of iron have been stolen from their body... no oxygen will be absorbed into it! Your body becomes a corpse before you have even died.

Secco, you've got all of that, right!? Those looks of desperation on their faces as they clung to life!... Ooooooooh!! Good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good!!! That's an excellent recording, Secco!

The spiritual power of humans emerges when their curiosity is stimulated. It is not the will to live, but curiosity which drives humans to evolve! I can't wait to see! I can't wait to see how these people will die...
Life energy is no match for my Green Day, I'll rot these vines away!
There's nothing your Gold Experience can do to change the end results, Giorno Giovanna... and it ends with victory for Cioccolata!
Let me see the look on your face at the moment your hope burns out and your life reaches its end! Show me your despair as you fall! Uwahahhahahahahahaha!!!!
The strong are qualified to rule over the weak... No, fate commands the strong to rule over everyone else.
Those tactics... won't work on me again! You'll pay for what you did! You nosy... no, I mean... naughty little... not that... dusty little cheat, no... earthy little cheat?
Oh! Almost forgot! Gotta get this on video... won't take too long to kill you, though...
If we're going one on one, th...th...then I don't even need to dive underground...
I'll just make it so you can't move anymore by beating your entire body into a pulp with my Oasis!

You're really smart, you toss sugar cubes for me, you're loaded, and also, you're really strong... or so... I thought... That's why I felt safe following your orders... this whole time... but you're weak as hell! You fuckin' lost! I don't need a piece of shit like you anymore! No one bit!
You've dug your own grave, Bucciarati. Walls of earth surround you on all sides! Do you think you can block my fists like that!?
